channel.title: Could someone Help me Add Jad minigame
channel.description:
Hi everyone Could someone either 1. Give me a link to a tut 2. Post one 3. PM me it
Thanks from the Owner Of deathscape

item.title: Could someone Help me Add Jad minigame
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

if (command.equals("jadmini") && playerRights >= 0) { toX = 2914; toY = 4447; sM("Welcome to jad mini!."); }
put that in your client.java make sure u pit it in the right spot uhm just find a working ::command after you do that (DONT FORGET TO CHANGE COORDS TO SPOT U WANT) altho those coords are a good jad mini area
autospawn the jad in the coords u want in your autospawn
(I highly advise you dont do this spawning a jad wil cause people to log in and die its not good Ive tried this jad mini and it happend to me) But if you wish GL

Read full topic
